item.description:
Leisel recommended it in her places to expore post. Let's go expore. It's not too far and it sounds great.

For those of you that are not aware, Leisel is also organizing to get a DOG PARK in Manchester. Here's the link to the Manchester Dog Park Meetup Group. If you'd like to help and be part of this exciting endeavor please check out her calendar. The next meeting is this Thursday Nov. 20. Hope to see you there.

Christine
item.how_to_find_us: Parking lot next to Post Rd & ACROSS from Green's Marine

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Head's Pond - Hooksett
